::Spears::

She was just a few miles away from the Ark.  She could hear the 
sounds of a fight.  She heard the explosions and lazar fire.  She 
pulled a quill from her side.  It stung a little, but it was more 
discomfort than pain.  She pulled it out to make it into a staff and 
walked causiously towards the Ark. 

She was only a mile away and could see the fight ensueing.  She crept 
along the side of the road, keeping to the tall grasses and trying to 
stay hidden.  She held her staff out infront of her to block anything 
that came her way.
